message.body: From what I can remember of it
That's what you were talking about yesterday
Why do I talk so much?
We all went out, like eight of us
And ended up back at my place with a few other people
So Dan got home from work yesterday and approached me
Very un-dan like to confront someone
He said he felt 'uncomportable' at the party the other night
So I said, "yeah, I kinda noticed" and asked him why he was uncomfortable
He replied, "because you and Amy where on the couch together for 3 hours"
I mean seriously, it's been six months
so I asked him if he still has feelings for her, and he responded, "yeah" followed by a whispered, "...of course"
I tend to be pretty good at making awkward situations seem less so
when I want to, that is
at first , I was really impressed that he came to me with his feelings
and told me that my actions where bothering him, as ridiculous as it may be
then Kristin told me that she talked to him that morning and he told her the same thing (which I already knew, it seemed quite obvious that he was agitated)
and she told him to talk to me about it
why the fuck would he talk to kristin about it?
hmm, so let's see...let me tell the girl who has/had a crush on me before/during/after I was seeing Amy that I still have feelings for her and seeing her with another guy irks me
Maybe that'll help Kristen get over him
So a fun night, but not _fun_ fun?
I'm not sure what you're getting at?
oh, so I told dan that I'm not interested in amy'
that we are just friends, and yeah sometimes I cuddle a little with my friens
he said that he feels he may have to talk to her
I really, REALLY wanted to tell him that she is not at all interested in having him back
but I just couldn't do it
She'll have to do it at some point
I did my very best to insinuate it
at one point I think I said something like, "if it bothers you that much, then maybe you need to not hang out with her for a while"
and he's still not really interested in being in a relationship with her, even though he knows that is what she wants
I started listening to the album you sent me on spotify awhile ago
yeah, I don't think spotify allows you to see what you
haha, I recall you not being very impressed when I first sent it to you
All you sent me was the album
and I don't think I listened to it
hmm, I could have sworn you made a comment, but maybe it was referring to something else
do we need to have a talk?
Well, shit happened, but nothing's changed
Does it have to go further than that?
I mean, you DID take it further already
and btw, please don't inflate my ego any futher
He and I were both too drunk, I think
The look on the one dude's face was priceless
shocked that someone would turn her down?
have to say, he does have you beat on the cuddling front though
I'm just glad you're not comparing =|
I'm not like taking notes or anything
There's always a static comparison though
that made more sense in my head
of course, but that doesnt mean you have to bring it up. It's not as if I asked
I'm in a weird mood today, like I said
I don't really care about anything at all right now
it doesn't bother me, I was just making an observation
you asked if the discussion needed to go any further, which I found rather odd given the information you had previously disclosed
There wasn't any changes on the emotional front or anything either
Things felt a little different this morning, so I'm not sure where anything stands
Not in a 'good' way, if good = emotional bonding
I'm really tired btw, so take that into consideration when analyzing this conversation
didn't get much sleep the previous night
I think I went to sleep pretty early actually
Then I kept waking up, convinced it was 2 hrs later than it was
But no, I had 3 hours of combat fitness/FIGHT this morning
yeah yo did text me pretty early this morning
well, I can say that at this point Im cool with it
if I see drastic changes in behavior then it may change
as of right now, you won't
so it was a little weird this morning?
I'm probably just being too sensitive
oh, and I did have one other thought
it's stupid, but when you said "better"
Yeah, no, that's a fair question
So I'm not saying that's a definitive difference
Maybe it'll be different under other circumstances
it's more like, I am wondering what it is specifically that you like, or don't like
I could give a shit about comparison
I'm always striving for improvement, and heck maybe thats part of it too
I feel I am fairly observant in general
oh, so Nav got a phone number last night. So excited for him!
honestly I would but I didnt get much of a reaction so I moved on
And it takes a lot of prep time to get me close to that point, which I find annoying.
The reason for that is because I'm concentrating on the feeling
So yeah. Not a big deal really. But possibly useful.
If you have any suggestions for me, btw, I'm more than willing to hear them
Possibly, but that's not really our thing, lol
And it really does take a _while_
it hasn't been, but Im not apposed to it
but doesn't always work that way
I'm more concerned about the emotional component inherent in that sort of stuff, tbh
There's a lot of insecurities around that for girls, I think
fyi: most guys don't mind, but some do
fuck, why are we talking about his?
He's a couchsurfer. e biked like 50 miles here and we went out for lunch and he was dead tired so I told him he could nap in my bed since I would be cleaning in the living room
soooo, what's your week looking like?
tomorrow is meditation night, so not ideal
thursday and possibly friday into sat
I could possibly come down Wed night, but that's not going to be able to be called until that night
I'll be drinking in West Chester with coworkers
I might end up crashing with one of them, depending on what state we leave the bar in
if not, then maybe I could come up thursday
I'm prob not going to be making any crazy plans this week
Outside of you and possibly Michael
This album that you sent me is perfect for me right now
looks to be a fairly typical week for me
mm, see... I just asked him if he wanted to call any of the days of the week and I got no response to that
But he answered other texts about other topics
Not sure if I should read into it or not
Right now I dgaf either way, haha
Guess I'm not falling in love with him after all ;)
She would have had a better case if it wasn't "hi"
j/k, and btw, if one more person asks me about amy...
Man, what is it about her, anyway? lol
3+ boys want a piece, and one of them is borderline obsessed
oh and seriously, listen to that I&W album
Sometimes I really like I&W and others their music really annoys me
his first album he recorded in his apartment by himself
I mean now he has a band and all, but I still think of it as one dude
the my morning jacket is really good too
I particularly enjoy the feel-good "wonderful the way I feel"
so wait, quit distracting me...who are these 3+ boys that 'want a piece'?
Was mostly saying it to be obnoxious
I cannot keep up with Milena's FB shenanigans
um, yeah I dunno about joe
and I don't think I qualify either
He seemed pretty into her at Josh's
I have, as I have expressed in the past, zero interest in dating her
may I remind you of last night?
so whatever it is that you are doing is different?
I do like amy as well
And I wasn't saying anything about you or your decisions
I just don't want to date her
It was just an absent-minded speculation about where I am
this movie started off with a PSA about cigarettes being bad for you
Definitely see the allure if it's right there, no chasing involved though
yeah, I've never seen her that way before. I definitely noticed her at the party
and then the other night there was certainly an attraction there I couldn't really explain
Dan told me not to invite her over tonight though
appears he is taking my advice. smart move
Or keeping you away from her
he did a shitty job of it last night tho
well, I told her no cuddling on the couch
we were sitting next to each other on the 'love' seat for a while
and at some point he left
went over to his moms to sleep because it was too loud here
so he must trust me fairly well
I did tell him I wasn't interested...
I got to run to the store
Ah. I'm feeling pretty good.right now. Just me and the guys enjoying some Philly pale ales
Michael just called me... guess he's still interested-ish
So drinking pale ales from the Philadelphia Brewing Co?
I'm trying to piece together what you were saying
At the house drinking yards Philly pale
I spelled it like that on purpose, but now I don't know why
it's really hot here right now
It feels like someone caned me -.-
No, if I had been, I wouldn't have phrased it like that
we went to bed pretty early
We were both tired and drunk
And by early, I mean like 10-11
I'm just less moody today and am willing to be more generous
haha, sounds like someone is infatuated
Not really. Feeling less interested than I was last week.
I wish I could somehow understand the female psyche, then I could write a book and make lots of money
You yourself were super interested in Claire and then weren't so much
hmm, theres a few reasons for that.
1. she appears interested, so, you know...
2. we've agreed to put it on the back burner
3. I have entirely too many other things to keep me distracted
It's still a reaction based on the other person's assumed interest
I think it's just the other distractions part in general
I habitually have like 4-5 "crushes" at any given time
oh, sorry. I meant the fact that you two did
I can see there being less interest
Yeah, I'm sure it affects things
I wonder if the shoulders are because of grocery shopping
There's still a need for discovery
And then Saturday wasn't so much
So there's an inconsistency that needs to be figured out
so then there is still an interest
I do not appear as enraptured as I was last week
But yes, that's the effect essentially
Might be because I'll be hanging out with a couple of cute guys on Wednesday lol
these the co-workers you may be couchsurfing with?
Not sure who's coming out yet, and one of the cute ones lives in NJ, so he's not someone I'd crash with
And one of the cute ones is a friend
well I mean he's still a cute guy
damn, you're worse than I am
I don't know how to feel about my date tomorrow
right, with one of the ones you've already told me about, or a new one?
If you don't want to tell me, that's fine
umm, I don't know if I did or not
have you guys gone out before? or is this the first?
I think to myself, what her msg me...
and fucking asks me out at that
like I said, my ego is the size of a gas giant right now
Last night was fun for me
and you're not helping with your comments
So I was chatting with you, flirting with an Australian kid I've known online for like 10+ years, Michael was calling me, and then my hot Canadian friend was Skype-calling me
except it was all happening at the same time
and I am a good cuddler goddamnit! :o
Or, rather, his style of cuddling is more compatible with mine
Oh, I know you are, no worries lol
I mostly just said it to dig at you
The fact that you brought it up hours and hours after I said it means that I succeeded
You'd consider it a victory too if you'd done it
listen, I had to hold on to it in order to keep my head from exploding
You were like "Don't inflate my ego any more"
And I was like "Well, here's this random comparison where you don't come out favorably"
is there an example of this superior cuddling?
There have been plenty of examples ^_^
right, that you can describe to me
I can't tell sometimes if we're intentionally out-dead-panning each other or if there's actually a mistaken understanding of our verbal styles.
He's a bit more full-contact... cuddles pretty close, stronger holds
he's also a bit more man-handle-y
It figures you would be into the 'strong' stuff
eh, might just be tmi at this point
But yeah, during cuddling, he'll just kind of rearrange body parts to wherever he wants them
Which is both weird and cute
especially for someone you don't know that well
so you say his interest seems to have diminished?
I read into things way too much
My imagination is far too active for my own good
Im assuming less frequency in contact
Yeah, there's a bit of that
he did call me last night
Amy called me like four times on saturday
imagine how many it'd be if you actually did anything with her haha
I don't know how to interpret that face
you CANNOT say a word, hint at, or anything related to anyone EVER
I don't pass on any of your shit to anyone
and this is me being 100% motherfucking serious
lives depend on it not getting out
And I actually feel like I mean it more than I usually do, so take that for whatever it's worth.
I honestly didn't want to say anything to you, and I felt awful about it
Alright, stop right there for a second.
If you ever, _ever_ tell me that you need something to not be said, nothing will even be breathed about it to anyone you know.
If you tell me that you are 100% serious about it not being spoken of, I won't talk about it with anyone period.
Example: Josh's situation v. the Amy situation
I talked to my best friend in Florida about Josh, because I'd already talked about him with her.
The whole thing was hardly a big deal, and it never would have leaked into your social circle.
The Amy situation, you're more serious about, more invested in, and care about more
Don't not tell me things because you don't think I can be trusted with them. Just make sure I understand how serious you are.
Anything personal and important won't be disclosed.
didn't mean to bail like that
it wasn't really that, I just needed to get myself together first
I do trust you and I wouldnt be doing this if I didnt
I just wanted to elaborate that you get all the benefits that my close friends get =P
so yeah, NO ONE can know about it
I just feel better about it that way
ok, so that's out of the way
so yeah, stuff happened sat night
I believe I mentioned dan left
at some point to go to his moms to sleep
I'm like, we cant do this
I have rooms in my house
so this happens a few more times
she starts making out with me, I eventually tell her "no" and stop her
They're well placed for comedic effect
it's late, I want people to leave
so Nav gives amy a ride home, they all leave
Was Amy making out with you in front of everyone?
I would not have allowed that. In the dining room, kitchen, and on the couch when everyone was outside
"they could walk in at any time!"
kinda exciting though, in a way
This groupon is expiring on Wed http://www.groupon.com/baltimore/deals/the-mughal-garden
So, how have things been with her since then?
that's not the end of the story
so after she makes meatballs and eats them, at 5am
I'm like, "dude, where are you going? are you ok to drive?"
You find the strangest fucking people
Less of a twist than I'd thought
what the fuck did you think happened?
Oh, I just considered a different reason for your "we can't"
I don't know, I didn't really formalize the thought. More along the lines of consideration for Dan's feelings / her clearly unbalanced emotional state.
Probably not the best decision you've ever made
I don't really feel that bad
But you're surrounded by people who constantly make the worst possible choices they could, it seems, so it's kind of understandable
Like I said, "in front of people" fits better ^_^
yeah, I mean that's really what it was
I felt like a fucking secret agent being chased by the fbi, looking over my shoulder
That was probably a good sign that you shouldn't be doing what you did lol
I didn't hope it would be anything
Maybe you'll have crazy chemistry with her too
Ill be fine, it just would have been nice to have a few more days
so, I guess we are even
haha, I don't like the way that sounds
Yeah, that's probably not a good way of looking at it =/
I don't mean like as a competition
is this what happens when we don't see each other on the weekend?
I don't even know how to think about answering that, to be honest
You wouldn't have a problem with it, I think, if it were someone other than Amy
I don't really have a problem with it
because I think people should just do what they want to do
it's a little ridiculous that we have to sneak around. Her and Dan were never really together, and they haven't dated since january
So tell her to make it clear to him that it's never going to happen
That's what you get for allowing yourself to be involved
Start saying "no, deal with your own problems"
what am I suppose to do, ignore everything?
Or "no, go talk to that person about your problems with them"
I DID say that to him
actually, I said I think they need a break from each other
The four of you should sit down in a room and just spill all of it
When did you and Amy go out?
Before or after she and Dan?
which dan later came to me and said he needs. People should just listen to me in the first place
I'm trying to figure out the timeline
Too many people and paths intersecting
two guys reject her for amy?
Is Kristin in love with you too?
There seriously must be some weird shit in the water in Newark
You're the craziest motherfucker of them all
You actually willingly tolerate this shit
The rest of them are too broken to realize there's anything wrong with their approaches to the world.
You know better but wallow in it anyway
I can't wrap my head around _liking_ drama
It doesn't just _happen_ in the magnitudes/quantities you experience without people helping it along
and yes, sometimes interesting is better than good
but I'd rather these people stopped acting like this. Did I ask any of these people to like me? Did I ask Dan to act like a psychotron?
You allow yourself to be the patriarchal figure
By doing that, you're tacitly giving them permission to give you all the responsibility in their lives
so I should just, I repeat, not give a shit?
No, you set up better boundaries
And don't allow them to use you
I TELL them to take responsibility
Dan is 200% better now than when I first met him
You just keep listening to their shit
I am indirectly responsible for them moving apart
this whole co-hosing thing is based on making each other's lives better
I seem to be the one suffering the most from it
They would be listening to my shit if I had any
It's not their fault that their lives are all fucked up. People have feelings/emotions that they get too wrapped up in
I talk to them, try to help them with their problems, like any good friend would
How they react to that I have no control over
and I agree, it's fucking ridiculous
I don't want it to be this way
but she's indicated interest in you?
I'm just saying, you should consider yourself lucky
your 'thing' is not being attracted/interested in every woman? sounds normal to me
huh, your friend tiffany is relatively attractive
this is based on her fb profile pic
I think she kind of looks like Kristin in it
yeah I see it a little. thanks for ruining
Tiffany's very married friend who's currently pregnant with her second child
So you can act all incredulous this time and it'll be legit
I also have no intention of tasting either one of them, but won't judge you if you do. ^_^
yeah, I don't get the point
this was discovered at the party on sat during discussion
Has never tried or just doesn't like to or has some sort of issue with it?
So, what's your meditation night about?
More specifically, when does it start/end
but we usually wind down for a bit, so like 7:45 and last for 20 min
then we talk a bit after
it's good. I find it relaxing, especially after a crazy weekend
Don't suppose you'd want to drive up here after that, hm?
I want to say I blame you
So I still kind of blame you
you need to move to WC
I have liquor, but not a whole lot of beer
I can't believe you asked that =P
what? when you come here I provide refreshments
I can throw in a shoulder massage
I was going to point out that the last several times I've been down there, the only thing of _yours_ that I've eaten or drank was the party guac and the pretzels
But I'll just shut up and take it
What kind of food do you want? lol
I have whiskey, tequila, and vodka, but no mixers.
I have one 22 oz thing of beer
that's fine, seeing as I need to stop drinking so much
I am going to the grocery store tonight though, so I will consider reasonable food requests
food, I don't care. not carbs
Are you talking about coming up after the meditation thing?
I may cancel, if no one is coming
Just trying to estimate a time frame
Dan isn't going to be here, I haven't heard from kristin
either way I wouldn't be leaving here until after 7pm
I prob won't be super hungry either
a small, I repeat, small amount of ice cream would be appreciated
right, I added that on at the end
popcorn, pretzels, and pizza it is =|
its not that I dont eat carbs, its just easier if I say that
Im cool with popcorn, and rice
I was contemplating buying a bag of chips or something before you said that
I can keep popcorn on hand without eating it
I have like 20 bags of the shit
then bring your own damn popcorn =P
(I say that as I write it down on my list -.-)
no, really I can bring some. I'll never use it
are you craving a particular kind of ice cream?
I mean, if you want to, but it seems like a decent thing to have on hand for emergency entertaining
eh, I just remembered I have some too
maybe Ill bring some with me as well
yeah, got it yesterday and forgot about it
do you specifically want beer, or could I just pick up soda/juice that you could mix stuff with?
no, no more beer. I have a 30 pack of pbr in the fridge. I am not a hipster
I mean, I am a hipster
I'm glad my argument persuaded you to admit it?
which, of course, makes me not
to milenas rental property to give her an estimate
If she tries and succeeds, will you still come up here tonight?
Im pretty sure she won't, I mean she didn't on sat
and I can't go there right now, so she won't suceed
shit, I better run. I got too much to do
allegedly keeps you from tearing things or something
yeah but gotta be at least warmed up first
You had stuff to do, was wondering if you'd started
hey, so you're alright with hanging out with my crazy friends on sat?
Yeah, planning on coming down for the party
